Title: Requires when external indices are utilized to determine sales and use tax due, such indices to reflect local economic conditions
Summary: Requires the commissioner of taxation and finance, when using external indices to determine sales and compensating use tax due because of failure to file a return or filing of an incorrect return, to use external indices which reflect local economic conditions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the determination of sales and compensating use taxes due
